info.description: TODO: Please specify the description of this service
info.title: Company Service Service API

post.description: Create the Company specified within the body of this request.  The created Company will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: newCompanyV1
parameters.description: A new Company to be created

get.description: Risk Match has Updated the Company specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated Company will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Company to replace or 0 for all companies

get.description: Retrieves active (not deleted) company specified with the specified value of aiic

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: aiic
parameters.description: The aiic to search by

get.description: Retrieves active (not deleted) company with the associated AmBest ID

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: amBestId
parameters.description: The AmBest ID of the company to retrieve

get.description: Retrieves active (not deleted) company specified with the specified value of fein

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: fein
parameters.description: The fein to search by

put.description: Update the Company specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated Company will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Company to replace

parameters.name: newCompanyV1
parameters.description: A Company to replace the existing Company

delete.description: Delete a company. Only called from Risk Match.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the company.

get.description: Retrieves active (not deleted) children of the company specified by id, filtered by the given primary roles.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the company whose children are to be retrieved

parameters.name: primaryRoles
parameters.description: the roles to filter by

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

get.description: Retrieves active (not deleted) children of the company specified by id

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: page

get.summary: Find companies by name and roles
get.description: Retrieves active (not deleted) companies matching the given name and primary roles (intersection)

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name to search by

parameters.name: primaryRoles
parameters.description: The roles to search by

parameters.name: topLevelOnly
parameters.description: Whether to get only top-level companies

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

get.summary: Find companies by name or naic and primary roles
get.description: Retrieves active (not deleted) companies matching the given NAIC or, if no NAIC is provided or the given NAIC is invalid, returns companies matching the given name and primary roles (intersection)

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: nameOrNaic
parameters.description: The NAIC or name to search by

parameters.name: primaryRoles
parameters.description: The roles to search by

parameters.name: topLevelOnly
parameters.description: Whether to get only top-level companies

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: page

get.description: Retrieves all companies excluding deleted ones

parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parentCompanyId.description: The ID of the immediate parent of this company

companyAliases.description: list of other names the company may be known by

logo.description: URL of image representing the logo of the company

detailedMarketingUrl.description: URL to page containing more detailed information regarding this company's marketing

slogan.example: Like a good neighbor, State Farm is there

amBestId.description: The ID of this company's corresponding AM Best carrier

amBestCarrierName.example: HEALTH CARE SERVICE CORPORATION A MUTUAL LEGAL RESERVE COMPANY
amBestCarrierName.description: The name of this company's corresponding AM Best carrier

amBestRating.description: The rating given to this company's corresponding AM Best carrier

amBestRatingEffectiveDate.description: The date after which the current rating is applicable for the corresponding AM Best carrier

amBestDomicile.description: The domicile of this company's corresponding AM Best Carrier

amBestFinancialSizeCategory.description: The domicile of this company's corresponding AM Best Carrier

admittedStates.description: List of states in which this company may do business

aiic.description: Alien Insurer Identification Code (AIIC) assigned to this company

businessType.description: Business type assigned to this company

deleted.description: flag that indicates that company has been deleted or replaced by a new version with new id (firstNewCompanyId)

fein.description: Federal Employer Identification Number (FEIN) assigned to this company

firstNewCompanyId.description: The ID of the next version of this company

inactiveTime.description: The date company was marked as deleted (and optionally was replaced by a new version with new id)

lastNewCompanyId.description: The ID of the current version of this company

naic.description: The NAIC code associated with this company's corresponding AM Best Carrier

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.
